# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

start_sources()
# -- uqs_datasource_xml.waf_files --
sources_platform(ALL)
add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "datasource_xml"
		"datasource_xml/StdAfx.cpp"
		"datasource_xml/StdAfx.h"
)

add_sources("UQS_uber_datasource_xml.cpp"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Root"
		"DataSource_XML_Includes.h"
	SOURCE_GROUP "datasource_xml"
		"datasource_xml/SyntaxErrorCollector_XML.h"
		"datasource_xml/SyntaxErrorCollector_XML.cpp"
		"datasource_xml/QueryBlueprintLoader_XML.h"
		"datasource_xml/QueryBlueprintLoader_XML.cpp"
		"datasource_xml/QueryBlueprintSaver_XML.h"
		"datasource_xml/QueryBlueprintSaver_XML.cpp"
		"datasource_xml/QueryBlueprintFileLibrary.h"
		"datasource_xml/QueryBlueprintFileLibrary.cpp"
		"datasource_xml/XMLDatasource.h"
		"datasource_xml/XMLDatasource.cpp"
)

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

macro (CryUQS_DataSource_XML_SetupOptions)
if (ORBIS OR CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "Clang")
	target_compile_options(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE
		-Wno-parentheses
		-Wno-reorder
		-Wno-unused-value
		-Wno-unknown-pragmas
		-Wno-format
		-Wno-unused-private-field
		-Wno-multichar
		-Wno-empty-body
		-Wno-switch
		-Wno-unused-function
		-Wno-char-subscripts
		-Wno-c++11-narrowing
	)
elseif(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
	target_compile_options(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE
		-Wno-unused-function
		-Wno-unused-value
		-Wno-sign-compare
		-Wno-unused-but-set-variable
		-Wno-misleading-indentation
		-Wno-unknown-pragmas
		-Wno-char-subscripts
		-Wno-strict-aliasing
		-Wno-multichar
		-Wno-reorder
		-Wno-parentheses
		-Wno-format
		-Wno-switch
	)
endif()

target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT}
	PRIVATE datasource_xml
	PRIVATE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}"
	INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../.."
)

if(OPTION_UQS_SCHEMATYC_SUPPORT)
	target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT}
		PRIVATE "${CRYENGINE_DIR}/Code/CryEngine/CrySchematyc/Core/Interface"
		PRIVATE "${CRYENGINE_DIR}/Code/CryEngine/CrySchematyc/STDEnv/Interface"
	)
endif()
endmacro()

if (OPTION_STATIC_LINKING AND NOT OPTION_STATIC_LINKING_WITH_GAME_AS_DLL)
CryEngineStaticModule(CryUQS_DataSource_XML PCH "datasource_xml/StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryPlugins/CryUQS")
else()
CryEngineStaticModule(CryUQS_DataSource_XML FORCE_SHARED PCH "datasource_xml/StdAfx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryPlugins/CryUQS")
endif()
CryUQS_DataSource_XML_SetupOptions()
